noPermission.description_limit_premium: You have reached the maximum number of tickets available in your plan. Upgrade to the Premium plan to unlock unlimited tickets!
noPermission.description_premium_feature: This feature is only available with the Premium plan. Upgrade your plan now to unlock it!
noPermission.description_embed: You do not have permission to use this command!
noPermission.description_embed_no_features: The feature is currently disabled. An administrator needs to enable it for it to be used.
noPermission.description_embed_no_features_by_system: This feature is temporarily disabled for extraordinary maintenance. Please be patient: it will be available again shortly.

messageChannel.modalTitlePlaceHolder: Enter the title for the ticket
messageChannel.modalDescriptionPlaceHolder: Message to be sent in the ticket channel

selectTicketChannel.description_embed: Select the channel where you want to send the ticket initialization message, where users can open their tickets.
selectTicketChannel.description_embed_two: You have initiated the process of creating the **Ticket System**, we have created the channel {0} for you, follow there for configuration.

errorDb.description_embed: We encountered a problem, please try again.

selectCategoryTicket.description_embed: Select now the category in which the tickets will be opened.

selectTranscriptTicket.description_embed: Select now the channel where the ticket transcripts will be sent.

endSetupTicket.description_embed: You have successfully completed the setup of the **Ticket System**, now add your components (buttons) that will allow users to submit tickets.

noFoundMessage.description_embed: The message was not found in the database! Make sure to execute the command in the channel where your ticket message is located.

ticketComponentsAdd.description_embed: You have successfully added the component to the ticket message.
ticketComponentsAdd.error_prefix: We have encountered an error, please refrain from using the same prefix as other components within the same message.

ticketInteractionSend.description_embed: You have successfully opened ticket {0}. Now, please provide the details of your request to allow the administrators to address your issue.

ticketChannelSend.description_embed: Your ticket has been submitted to the administrators, who will respond to your request shortly. In the meantime, please detail your issue thoroughly to expedite the resolution of your ticket.

ticketChannelDuplicate.description_embed: You cannot open duplicate tickets of the same type. If this is an error, please contact an administrator.

ticketChannelClaim.description_embed: The administrator {0} has taken charge of your ticket and will respond to your inquiries.

ticketClaimToAuthor.description_embed: Your ticket {0} has been taken over by {1}, please check its status.

ticketCloseToAuthor.description_embed: Your ticket has been deleted by {0}. If you believe the issue persists, feel free to reopen a ticket.

ticketTranscription.ticketClose: Your ticket has been resolved by {0}, the transcription has been sent to you.
ticketTranscription.ticketCloseNoTranscription: Your ticket has been resolved by {0}.
